title: Thematic Research and Data Collection Strategies for Documentary Production

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic educational content development and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Requires acquiring research methodologies for producing math-related documentaries

learning_goals: Learners will be able to apply at least three research techniques for selecting documentary topics
Learners will be able to appropriately utilize five types of online/offline data collection tools depending on the context
Learners will be able to design a systematic process for applying collected data to thematic analysis
Learners will be able to draft a documentary storyboard that visualizes mathematical concepts
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
